## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                      | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | -------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `value`  | `value`   | The value for progress indicator | `number` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event          | Description                                                           | Type               |
| -------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `statusUpdate` | An event that is passed to parent component by emitting updated value | `CustomEvent<any>` |
